subject: Running
Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Sanya Richards-Ross is the first American to win the Olympic women’s 400 since 1984. She beat the 2008 gold medalist and the 2011 world champion.
snippet: Sanya Richards-Ross is the first American to win the Olympic women’s 400 since 1984. She beat the 2008 gold medalist and the 2011 world champion.
